pull.title: fuzz: Fix DecodeHexTx fuzzing harness issue
pull.body:
Fix `DecodeHexTx` fuzzing harness issue.

Before this patch:

```
$ src/test/fuzz/decode_tx
decode_tx: test/fuzz/decode_tx.cpp:29: 
    void test_one_input(const std::vector<uint8_t> &):
    Assertion `result_try_witness_and_maybe_no_witness' failed.
…
```

After this patch:

```
$ src/test/fuzz/decode_tx
…
```

events.message: fuzz: Fix DecodeHexTx fuzzing harness issue

issue.title: fuzz: Assert expected DecodeHexTx behaviour when using legacy decoding
issue.body:
Assert expected `DecodeHexTx` behaviour when using legacy decoding.

As suggested by MarcoFalke in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20290#issuecomment-720989597.

comments.body: maybe I'm not thinking about this right though.. I do see how this can be different. Fuzzing is new to me, interested to see what you think (or if I'm wrong here)
